.q-toggle {
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.q-toggle__native {
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
}
.q-toggle__track {
  height: 0.35em;
  border-radius: 0.175em;
  opacity: 0.38;
  background: currentColor;
}
.q-toggle__thumb {
  top: 0.25em;
  left: 0.25em;
  width: 0.5em;
  height: 0.5em;
  transition: left 0.22s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  -webkit-user-select: none;
     -moz-user-select: none;
      -ms-user-select: none;
          user-select: none;
  z-index: 0;
}
.q-toggle__thumb:after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.14), 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
}
.q-toggle__thumb .q-icon {
  font-size: 0.3em;
  min-width: 1em;
  color: #000;
  opacity: 0.54;
  z-index: 1;
}
.q-toggle__inner {
  font-size: 40px;
  width: 1.4em;
  min-width: 1.4em;
  height: 1em;
  padding: 0.325em 0.3em;
}
.q-toggle__inner--indet .q-toggle__thumb {
  left: 0.45em;
}
.q-toggle__inner--truthy {
  color: #1976d2;
  color: var(--q-color-primary);
}
.q-toggle__inner--truthy .q-toggle__track {
  opacity: 0.54;
}
.q-toggle__inner--truthy .q-toggle__thumb {
  left: 0.65em;
}
.q-toggle__inner--truthy .q-toggle__thumb:after {
  background-color: currentColor;
}
.q-toggle__inner--truthy .q-toggle__thumb .q-icon {
  color: #fff;
  opacity: 1;
}
.q-toggle.disabled {
  opacity: 0.75 !important;
}
.q-toggle--dark .q-toggle__inner {
  color: #fff;
}
.q-toggle--dark .q-toggle__inner--truthy {
  color: #1976d2;
  color: var(--q-color-primary);
}
.q-toggle--dark .q-toggle__thumb:before {
  opacity: 0.32 !important;
}

  width: 0.8em;
  min-width: 0.8em;
  height: 0.5em;
  padding: 0.07625em 0;
}
.q-toggle--dense .q-toggle__thumb {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
}
.q-toggle--dense .q-toggle__inner--indet .q-toggle__thumb {
  left: 0.15em;
}
.q-toggle--dense .q-toggle__inner--truthy .q-toggle__thumb {
  left: 0.3em;
}

  padding-left: 0.5em;
}

  padding-left: 0;
  padding-right: 0.5em;
}
body.desktop .q-toggle:not(.disabled) .q-toggle__thumb:before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: currentColor;
  opacity: 0.12;
  transform: scale3d(0, 0, 1);
  transition: transform 0.22s cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1);
}
body.desktop .q-toggle:not(.disabled):focus .q-toggle__thumb:before,
body.desktop .q-toggle:not(.disabled):hover .q-toggle__thumb:before {

}

body.desktop .q-toggle--dense:not(.disabled):hover .q-toggle__thumb:before {

  left: 0;

  height: 100%;
  opacity: 0;
  border-radius: inherit;
  transition: background-color 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.5, 1), opacity 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.5, 1);

o=t("24fb");e=o(!1),e.push([n.i,'* {
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
  --main-bg-color: #fff;
  --main-borders-color: #2e2768;
  --btn-color: #c00027;
  --btn-color1: #d00027;
  --violet-btn-color: #8645ff;
  --violet2: #95f;
  --violet-light: #edf;
  --chip-color: rgba(134,69,255,0.2);
  --color1: #2e2768;
  --color-graypink: #f8f4ff;
  --footer-color: #edeef2;
  --logoWidth: 180px;
  --maxW: 1135px;
  --menubg-color: #ecedf0;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1160px) {
  * {
    --maxW: 100%;
  }
}
body {
  background-image: url("/statics/bg1.png"), url("/statics/bg2.png"), linear-gradient(180deg, var(--footer-color), var(--footer-color));
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto, auto, 100% 200px;
  background-position: right top, left 18px bottom, center bottom;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  body {
    background-size: auto, 160px, 100% 140px;
    background-image: url("/statics/bg1-mobile.png"), url("/statics/bg2-mobile.png"), linear-gradient(180deg, var(--footer-color), var(--footer-color));
    background-position: right top, left 8px bottom, center bottom;
  }
}
#q-app {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  position: relative;
  font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-size: 13px;
  line-height: 14px;
  margin: auto;
  min-height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}
#q-app .header-wrapper {
  border-bottom: 1.5px solid #e6e6e6;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .header-wrapper {
    border-bottom: 0;
  }
}
#q-app header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: 0px auto;
  height: 115px;
  padding: 0px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  max-width: var(--maxW);
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1160px) {
  #q-app header {
    padding: 0px 10px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 950px) {
  #q-app header {
    height: 95px;
    margin: 0px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app header {
    height: 75px;
    padding: 0px 5px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app header {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-top: 30px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    height: auto;
    padding: 0 20px;
  }
}
#q-app header #nav {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: 15px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app header #nav {
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0;
    order: 4;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: flex-end !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app header #nav .addJobMargin550 {
    margin-top: 21px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app header .header__langchanger {
    order: 1;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app header #authmenu {
    order: 3;
  }
}
#q-app .r-link {
  margin-right: 10px;
  display: block;
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: var(--main-borders-color);
  text-decoration: none;
}
#q-app h1,
#q-app h2,
#q-app h3,
#q-app h5,
#q-app h6 {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1;
}
#q-app h4 {
  line-height: 1;
}
#q-app .logo.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #fff;
}
#q-app .logo.router-link-exact-active:visited {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #fff;
}
#q-app .searched {
  background-color: #ff0;
}
#q-app .r-view {
  max-width: var(--maxW);
  min-height: calc(100vh - 150px - 1.5px - 200px);
  box-sizing: border-box;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
#q-app .pageHeader {
  font-family: Montserrat;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 20px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--btn-color);
  margin: 23px 0;
}
#q-app .logoText {
  color: var(--color1);
  letter-spacing: 0.115em;
  font-size: 34px;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: 'Montserrat', serif;
  line-height: 123.4%;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .logoText {
    font-size: 24px;
  }
}
#q-app .logolink {
  margin-right: 10px;
  text-decoration: none;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .logolink {
    margin: 5px auto;
    order: 2;
  }
}
#q-app .headerBtns1 {
  padding: 0 5px;
  white-space: nowrap;
  background-color: var(--btn-color);
  font-weight: bold;
  align-self: flex-start;
  border-radius: 10px;
  height: 40px;
  transition-duration: 0.3s;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .headerBtns1 {
    height: 40px;
    padding: 0;
    white-space: normal;
    max-width: 120px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .headerBtns1 {
    max-width: none;
    padding: 0 8px;
    height: 35px;
  }
}
#q-app .headerBtns1 div {
  font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif !important;
  font-size: 14px !important;
  line-height: 17px !important;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .headerBtns1 div {
    line-height: 1 !important;
    padding: 0 5px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .headerBtns1 div {
    font-weight: 600 !important;
    font-size: 12px !important;
    line-height: 15px !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .headerBtns1 div div {
    padding: 0;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .addJobSpecific {
    width: 168px;
  }
}
#q-app .headerBtnRed:hover {
  background-color: var(--btn-color1) !important;
}
#q-app .violetBtns {
  padding: 0 3px;
  margin-left: 15px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .violetBtns {
    margin-left: 10px;
    padding: 0 6px;
  }
}
#q-app .loginbtn {
  background-color: var(--violet-btn-color);
  font-weight: 700 !important;
  outline: none;
}
#q-app .loginbtn:hover {
  background-color: var(--violet2);
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .loginbtn {
    background: url("/statics/login.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    width: 22px;
    height: 22px;
    padding: 0 !important;
  }
  #q-app .loginbtn:hover {
    background-color: transparent;
    -webkit-filter: brightness(1.5);
            filter: brightness(1.5);
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .noshow-below550 {
    display: none;
  }
}
#q-app .displayblock-only550 {
  display: none;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .displayblock-only550 {
    display: block;
  }
}
#q-app .displaytc-only550 {
  display: none;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .displaytc-only550 {
    display: table-cell;
  }
}
#q-app .scrollTopBtn {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 12px;
  left: 40px;
  opacity: 0.7;
  z-index: 3;
}
#q-app .main__footer {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  margin: 0 auto;
  margin-top: auto;
  padding-top: 30px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  height: 200px;
  width: var(--maxW);
  padding: 30px 200px 12px 100px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 950px) {
  #q-app .main__footer {
    padding: 25px 75px 12px 50px;
    width: auto;
    max-width: var(--maxW);
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .main__footer {
    padding: 20px 15px 12px 15px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer {
    height: 140px;
    padding: 15px 20px;
  }
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top {
  display: flex;
  list-style-type: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top h3 {
  text-decoration: none;
  font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 12px;
  line-height: 15px;
  color: var(--color1);
  margin: 0;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top h3 {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top h3 {
    font-size: 11px;
    line-height: 13px;
  }
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  text-align: left;
  max-width: 20%;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li {
    max-width: 26%;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li {
    display: inline-block;
    max-width: 50%;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    min-width: 112px;
  }
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li ul {
  list-style-type: none;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li ul li {
  max-width: 100%;
  margin: 3px 0;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li ul li {
    margin: 1px 0;
  }
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li ul li a {
  width: 100%;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif;
  font-size: 12px;
  line-height: 15px;
  color: var(--color1);
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li ul li a:hover {
  color: var(--violet-btn-color);
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li ul li a {
    font-size: 11px;
    line-height: 13px;
  }
}
#q-app .main__footer .footer__ul-top li:last-child li a {
  font-weight: bold;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .li2 {
    order: 1;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .li2 {
    order: 4;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .li3 {
    order: 2;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .main__footer .li4 {
    order: 3;
  }
}
#q-app .user-status-bar {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}
#q-app .headerBtn {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: var(--main-borders-color);
  font-size: 16px;
  background-color: transparent;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  margin: 0 2px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding-right: 0px;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
  font-weight: 700;
}
#q-app .headerBtn:hover {
  color: var(--violet-btn-color);
}
.marginLeft30pxOnBig {
  margin-left: 30px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  .marginLeft30pxOnBig {
    margin-left: 0px;
  }
}
.multipleUploadsHeader {
  margin-right: 5px;
  transition-duration: 0.25s;
}
.multipleUploadsHeader:hover {
  color: var(--violet-btn-color);
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  .multipleUploadsHeader {
    margin-right: 0px;
  }
}
.footerLinkFB {
  background-color: var(--violet-btn-color) !important;
  color: #fff !important;
  font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif;
  padding: 0 5px !important;
  text-align: center;
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 0 !important;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  width: 136px !important;
}
.footerLinkFB:hover {
  background-color: var(--violet2) !important;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  .footerLinkFB {
    width: auto !important;
  }
}
#q-app .footerLinkFB.headerBtns1 div {
  font-weight: 600 !important;
  font-size: 13px !important;
  line-height: 13px !important;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  #q-app .footerLinkFB.headerBtns1 div {
    font-size: 10px !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  .nav-icon {
    font-size: 30px !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  .nav-icon-upl {
    font-size: 35px !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 550px) {
  .nav-icon-logout {
    font-size: 26px !important;
  }
}
.q-chip {
  background-color: var(--chip-color);
  height: 28px;
}
.q-chip__content {
  padding: 0 6px !important;
}
